text: Hagi Nagra kazeri rukrahe hu'na kagemazampafi huku rente'na kavazu nehu'na, maka sondia vaheka'ane, hosi afutamine, ana hosi afu agumpima vanoma hu'za ha'ma nehaza vahe'ene, tusi'a sondia vaheka'ane, ha' kukena zamine, neone hankozmine, ranra hankozmine, ha'ma hu zantamine bainati kazinena eri'nenage'na maka zamavare atiramigahue.
